name: Arena Stars: Battle Heroes
description:
CHOOSE YOUR HERO
Begin your journey with Knightingale, a noble warrior who fights for honor. Quickly unlock Mekkan, a tech genius who specializes in strike and evade tactics. Continue finding more Heroes, each with their own set of powerful abilities. Customize your favorite Hero with one of over 50 awesome skins!

ASSEMBLE YOUR TEAM
Doomrays, Magikins and Mana Missiles! Build your battle-ready Team from over 40 (and growing) Troops and Spells. Destroy others by finding the ultimate starting line-up. That's right, order matters here!

90 SECOND BATTLES. ANYTIME. ANYWHERE.
Start off with a stabbing lance against the enemy Hero. Good. Summon a Knightwing to breathe fire upon them. Very good. Throw up your shield and block the enemy's attacks. Excellent! Now, put them out of their misery with a devastating joust, your Ultimate ability! FANTASTIC!

LEAGUES
Learn the basics in training and hone those skills as you collect Trophies and make your way through the Battle Leagues. At the top of Gold and ready for the Pro Leagues? Good! That's where the cool new content is! Reach the top of the Pro Leagues and get early access to all the new stuff! Jealousy? That's the other player's problem.

SEASONS
Every month is a brand new Season and your chance to unlock exclusive new content! This is your only way to get it before everyone else. Play often and show off your progress on the Season leaderboard.



PLEASE NOTE - Arena Stars is free to download and play, but includes some items that can be purchased for real money. If you don't wish to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device settings.

Arena Stars requires an active mobile or Wi-Fi network connection to play.


FEATURES
● Challenge others from around the world in real-time
● Choose your Hero; powerful characters each with their own set of special skills and abilities
● Customize your Ultimate Team to defeat your opponents
● Earn Chests to unlock valuable rewards, collect new Cards and upgrade existing ones
● Collect Trophies to unlock exciting new Arenas, Heroes, Troops and Spells
● Win battles, earn bragging rights and climb the ladder to be the Season’s ultimate winner
● Come back daily to compete in Quests, collect your Bounties and earn free new rewards
● Epic, fast-paced one-on-one multiplayer action combining strategy with quick reflexes
● COMING SOON – Guilds, Card trading and more!

PLEASE NOTE - Arena Stars is free to download and play, but includes some items that can be purchased for real money. If you don't wish to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device settings.
